channel.title: Editors Choice on Chaotic Online
channel.description: Recent content in Editors Choice on Chaotic Online

item.title: Battle Lessons
item.description: In this episode Tom gets to know more about the main event in Chaotic: The CodeMasters Matches!

item.title: Blight Fight
item.description: In this episode we’ll meet Garv, the OverWorld Caretaker in charge of Lake Morn, helping Tom (and Smildon) to heal the Prexxor Chasm from the Blight instead of fighting it by brute-force

item.title: Chaotic Crisis
item.description: In this episode, the Creatures of Chaotic invade Earth! Let’s get Chaotic… for our planet!

item.title: From the Deep (Part 2)
item.description: In the continuation of the previous episode, betrayal, brainwash, a military coup and the beginning of the end… Let the Invasion begin!

item.title: Last Stand (Part 1)
item.description: In this episode, the beginning of the end… the battle for Perim is now!

item.title: Last Stand (Part 2)
item.description: In this episode, the battle continues in different regions of Perim at once… and in the Tribal Alliance itself as well

item.title: Son of the Spiritlands
item.description: In this episode, an indestructible Creature from the Spiritlands threatens to destroy the whole Perim unless Tangath Toborn faces him.

item.title:
The CodeMaster Chronicles
(Part 1)
item.description: In this episode we’ll see the first part of the most amazing match in Chaotic: The battle between Tom Majors and the CodeMaster Crellan!

item.title:
The CodeMaster Chronicles
(Part 2)
item.description: In continuation of the previous episode, the outcome of the epic battle.
